original_text: Then one of the seraphim flew to me, having in his hand a burning coal that he had taken with tongs from the altar.
korean_text: 그 때에 그 스랍 중의 하나가 부젓가락으로 제단에서 집은 바 핀 숯을 손에 가지고 내게로 날아와서

sentences.original_text: Then one of the seraphim flew to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 스라핌 중 하나가 내게 날아왔습니다

sentences.original_text: having in his hand a burning coal
that he had taken with tongs from the altar
